summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for a shipment. It includes information about the charges, discounts applied, and the recipient of the shipment. The invoice is dated September 24, 2004, and outlines the total amount due and payment instructions.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is listed as the recipient of the shipment detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Johnny Cramp
persons.context: Johnny Cramp is identified as the sender associated with the shipment.

persons.name: S. Berry
persons.context: S. Berry is noted as the individual who signed the invoice.

connections.description: Johnny Cramp is the sender of the shipment that was received by Darren Indyke.

events.title: Shipment Dropped Off
events.description: The shipment was dropped off at FedEx on September 21, 2004.

events.title: Delivery of Shipment
events.description: The shipment was delivered on September 22, 2004, at 10:15 AM.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-639-09197, dated September 24, 2004.
Total charges for the shipment amounted to USD $21.42.
Darren Indyke is listed as the recipient of the shipment.
Johnny Cramp is identified as the sender associated with the shipment.
